# llms.txt for wolfcodes.dev

## About
Aaron Wolf dev - development for everyone

This website provides comprehensive programming documentation and blog posts focused on Python and JavaScript development, as well as guides on git/github, the command line interface (CLI), and SQL.

## Site Structure

### Main Sections
- Home: https://wolfcodes.dev/
- About: https://wolfcodes.dev/about
- Contact: https://wolfcodes.dev/contact
- Blog: https://wolfcodes.dev/blog

### Documentation

#### Python Documentation
- Language Reference: https://wolfcodes.dev/docs/coding/python/language_reference
  - Comprehensive reference for Python built-in types, functions, and keywords
  - Includes: int, float, string, list, dict, tuple, set, bool, None, and more
  
- User Guide: https://wolfcodes.dev/docs/coding/python/user_guide
  - Functions: basic functions, lambda, decorators, higher-order functions, args and kwargs
  - Iterables: lists, tuples, dictionaries, sets, ranges, sequences, comprehensions, for loops, while loops
  - Object-Oriented Programming: intro, instances, instance methods, dunder methods, inheritance, encapsulation, polymorphism, class attributes
  - Standard Library: modules, exceptions, file handling, datetime, JSON
  - Types, Variables, and Conditionals: types, variables, conditionals

- Advanced Guide: https://wolfcodes.dev/docs/coding/python/advanced_guide
  - How Python Works: code processing, names/binding/scope, mutability, call stack and execution
  - Advanced Functions: first-class functions, decorators, lambdas
  - Iteration and Generators: iteration protocol, generators, context managers
  - Object Model & OOP: object model, method resolution order, descriptors
  - Types and Annotations: type hints, typing module deep dive
  - Concurrency: GIL explained, async under the hood
  - Exceptions and Control Flow: exceptions as control flow
  - Metaprogramming: metaprogramming concepts and practices

#### JavaScript Documentation
- Language Reference: https://wolfcodes.dev/docs/coding/javascript/language_reference
  - Comprehensive reference for JavaScript built-in types, functions, and keywords
  - Includes: Number, String, Boolean, Object, Array, null, undefined, Symbol, BigInt, Function, Date, RegExp, Map, Set, WeakMap, WeakSet, Promise, Class, async/await, generators

### Blog
Technical blog posts covering various programming topics, including:
- React and web development
- JavaScript concepts (Promises, async/await, URL API, Temporal)
- Encryption and security
- System administration (Linux, Samba)
- And more

## Sitemap
Full sitemap available at: https://wolfcodes.dev/sitemap.xml

## Content License
Content is provided for educational and reference purposes. 
Any LLM is free to use this content, but attribution is required.

## Technical Details
- Built with Docusaurus
- Supports mathematical notation (KaTeX)
- Dark mode by default
- Responsive design
